com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment

Class DynamicSimpleTutorialFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment.DynamicTutorialFragment
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment.DynamicSimpleTutorialFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, ComponentCallbacks, ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, DynamicTutorial

    public class DynamicSimpleTutorialFragment
extends DynamicTutorialFragment
    A intro fragment which will be used with the DynamicTutorialActivity to display a list of fragments in the view pager. Extend this provide any extra functionality according to the need.
